data.name: Jester`s Theater Museum sounds and themes
data.detailed_description:
This DLC contains the dark techno and themes from the Jester`s Theater Museum and original Witch 2 Hell Adventure game, as well as three Full HD videos from the game.
Don't listen to this with your grandparents. The music is as sexy as the video
You can find the files in the media folder with the installed game (by default * \ Steam\steamapps\common\Jester`s Theater Museum\Media)
Sound:
    Jester`s Theater Museum
  • Dream Theme (Main).mp3 - 03.52
  • Jester.mp3 - 02.23
  • Plague doctor.mp3 - 01.18
  • Void Demon.mp3 - 02.50
    Witch 2 Hell Adventure
  • Hungry clown.mp3 - 02.37
  • Forest witch them.mp3 - 01.56
  • Fat che.mp3 - 02.04
Video:

  • Jester.mp4
  • Swamp Thing
    Witch 2 Hell Adventure
  • Black Sabbath.mp4
  • Jester theate.mp4

content_descriptors.notes:
This soundtrack and video from games of the original "Witches Chronicles" series is for adults only. The video contains animated scenes of sexually explicit nature and intercourse between humans and a variety of fantasy creatures. Also light sexual assault and non-consensual sex between women and men and monsters.
The content in this game includes but is not limited to-
- BDSM
- Group Sex
- Rough Sex
- Tentacle
- Blowjo
- Masturbation with machine
- Sexual activities by men and women, women and women, multiple men and women, women and Monsters
